Showcase your services online.

Bapp Catalogues helps businesses to showcase their services and promotions online.


What is a Bapp Catalogue ?

Bapp catalogues help businessess to showcase their services via a simple link. We made publishing and editing the catalogue easy for everyone.

Fits various purposes

Use Bapp catalogues to run promotions and display products and services

Easy management

Build and publish the catalogue effortlessly using the app. Publish instantly.

Measure performance

Our analytics tools help you identify the best-performing products and services.

Features

Imagine managing your website without the help of a developer. You can customize your catalogue with easy to use features.

Analytics

Identify top performing services.
